sources.title: A Fight To The Finish (1947)
sources.description: Mighty Mouse at his fighting and singing best, rescuing the damsel-in-distress and his sweetheart, Pearl Pureheart, from the clutches of the oil-can-harry villain. He even finds himself tied to the railroad tracks and the situation appears desperate, but Mighty Mouse does it again in true super-hero, cliffhanging, true-serial thriller style, and leaps into a duel defying the loaded gun of the villain. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-fight-to-the-finish-1947/

metadata.Plot: Mighty Mouse at his fighting and singing best, rescuing the damsel-in-distress and his sweetheart, Pearl Pureheart, from the clutches of the oil-can-harry villain. metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
